subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams emphatically defeated Lucie Safarova, 6-0, 6-1, to win the final of the Family Circle Cup in 58 minutes on Sunday in Charleston, S.C.
snippet: Serena Williams emphatically defeated Lucie Safarova, 6-0, 6-1, to win the final of the Family Circle Cup in 58 minutes on Sunday in Charleston, S.C.
